alert.note: Alert for Craig; Montgomery (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Craig and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 549 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Huffman, or near Newport, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Huffman... Mc Donalds Mill... and Simmonsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
